txt.en: Found an acorn among the trees of Winter-home
Virgil Greenfield wants you to help him fill the snowman-field outside of Winter-home.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Gathered coal near the servants' oven

Looking before you, you see one of Virgil's finely-crafted snowmen. This particular snowman is wearing a scarf.\n\nAside from snow, he appears to be made of sticks, an acorn, and coal. Perhaps you can find everything you need to make one scattered about Frostbluff.
The materials you need to replicate Virgil's snowman can be found throughout Frostbluff.\n\nIn order to replicate Virgil's snowman, you will need to gather the right materials.
The snowman-field is outside Winter-home.\n\nNow that you have gathered the necessary supplies, you should head out to the field and find a snowpile to build your snowman.

'Ah, you are building that one! A good choice...very simple, but elegant.\n\n'What's that? You don't have a scarf? I'm certain you will be able to find one in town. With all of the excitement going on, I don't believe anyone would mind if you borrowed one for a while.'
Find an acorn scattered among the trees of Winter-home
Gather coal near the servants' oven
